Name: 1 1/2 Ritter - Auf der Suche nach der hinreißenden Herzelinde
Plot: The story of Lanze who is in love with the princess. One day the princess is kidnapped by the Dark Knight and Lanze starts his journey to rescue her. But he is not alone because Erdal, a Turk, joins him on his journey.
Director: Til Schweiger, Torsten Künstler, Christof Wahl

Name: The Intouchables
Plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
